Interfaces

Interface MechanicLounge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Lounge

    public interface MechanicLounge
    Interface for Mechanic for the use of the Lounge

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alertManagerRepairDone(int idKey, int mechanicId)
      Mechanic return key of the repaired car
      void finish()
      Mechanic declares that he/she is going home.
      int getCarToRepairKey(int mechanicId)
      Mechanic gets keys of car to be repaired
      void requestPart(int idType, int number, int mechanicId)
      Mechanic asks for a type of car parts for the repair

    • Method Detail

      • getCarToRepairKey

        int getCarToRepairKey(int mechanicId)
        Mechanic gets keys of car to be repaired
        Parameters:
        mechanicId - ID of the Mechanic
        Returns:
        key of the car to repair

      • requestPart

        void requestPart(int idType,
                 int number,
                 int mechanicId)
        Mechanic asks for a type of car parts for the repair
        Parameters:
        idType - - the id of the part to refill stock
        number - - the number of stock needed
        mechanicId - - the id of the mechanic

      • alertManagerRepairDone

        void alertManagerRepairDone(int idKey,
                            int mechanicId)
        Mechanic return key of the repaired car
        Parameters:
        idKey - - the id of the key (= idCar)
        mechanicId - - the id of the mechanic.

      • finish

        void finish()
        Mechanic declares that he/she is going home. Function is used for the locals/server termination.
